metadata.dc:author: Fariñas Salto, Mercedes
García de Pedro, Fernando J
Martín Molina, Raquel
Menéndez Hernando, Cristina
Galán Gómez, Víctor
metadata.dc:description: The description of the Bednar's ulcer is uncommon in the current literature. It has been associated with the traumatic effect of the bottle's nipple and/or no orthodontic soothers while breastfeeding. We present a newborn of 20 days of life attended at the emergency room for irritability, with the only finding on physical examination of two oral ulcers. We describe the clinical presentation, evolution and treatment. The normality of the diagnostic test, clinical characteristics and evolution lead to the diagnosis of Bednar´s ulcer.
metadata.dc:subject: pterygoid ulcer
oral pathology
oral ulcer
Bednar’s ulcer

metadata.dc:title: Recién nacido con úlcera de Bednar.
[Bednar's aphthae in newborn].
